statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - x , -x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + x - 5 , 8 \, x^{3} + 13 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 7 , -4 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 2 , 10 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
